name: Underworld (SpycrabSXL)
description:
A Prototype made for NYP independent work project.

Made by Jun Le

Course: Digital Game Arts and Design

Controls:
WASD to move
Left click to shoot and mouse to aim
Q to throw grenade (Has a cooldown but no ammo needed)
Space to toggle between slow-mo and normal (In slow-mo time only moves when you move)
Enemy get dazed for a while when their below 1/3 of their max hp, they will look darker than normal
Press F to slash which will instakill dazed enemies

There might be some visual bugs

OS: Windows 64 bit

Thank you and have a nice day :V
